casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ervy L. JONES, Jr. 123A95-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 30, 2019 Ervy L. Jones, Jr., for Jones, Ervy Lee. Jr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, William R. West, District Attorney, for Jones, Ervy Lee. Jr.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th of December 2018 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th of January 2019."
